title: B.S. Report - Jimmy Kimmel, Cousin Sal, Bryan Curtis
description: Jimmy Kimmel and Cousin Sal join Bill to discuss Mayweather-Pacquiao and what it was like to walk in with Manny. Plus, Bryan Curtis gives his perspective on the big fight.
